snippet: The Islanders insist their suburban fans will stick with the team when it moves to Brooklyn in two years, but the team will try to entice new supporters as well.
abstract: New York Islanders insist their suburban fans will stick with them when team moves to Brooklyn for 2015-16 season, but team will try to entice new supporters as well.

byline.original: By ALLAN KREDA and KEN BELSON
byline.contributor: Allan Kreda reported from Uniondale, N.Y., and Ken Belson from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Islanders insist their suburban fans will stick with the team when it moves to Brooklyn in two years, but the team will try to entice new supporters as well.

headline.main: Islanders Hope to Bring Fans to Brooklyn and Get New Ones, Too
headline.print_headline: Islanders Hope to Bring Their Fans, and Get New Ones
